problem.headline: The Problem with
problem.subheadline: Traditional farming methods create unnecessary barriers between livestock and environmental regeneration.

cards.title: Fire & Competition
cards.description: Pasture grasses compete with young trees for water and nutrients, while increasing fire risk around vulnerable saplings.

cards.title: Lost Land
cards.description: Farmers must fence off entire areas for tree establishment, removing productive land from grazing rotation for years.

cards.title: Expensive Guesswork
cards.description: Traditional tree guards are fragile, disposable, and often fail—wasting money and trees without guaranteed protection.

solution.headline: The
solution.subheadline: A revolutionary approach to tree protection that allows cattle and trees to coexist from day one.
solution.imageAlt: Close-up of Moonochew barbed stainless spring steel tree guard

features.title: Cattle-Resistant Design
features.description: Barbed stainless spring steel deters rubbing and browsing without harming animals.

features.title: No Fencing Required
features.description: Plant trees anywhere in your paddock without removing land from production.

features.title: Built to Last Forever
features.description: Infinitely reusable stainless steel construction means one-time investment for generations of trees.

features.title: 10-Minute Installation
features.description: Simple setup with no tools required. Just press into ground around your sapling.

features.title: Australian Made
features.description: Designed, tested, and manufactured in Australia for Australian conditions.

benefits.headline: Transform Your
benefits.subheadline: Join Australian farmers who are seeing real results from integrating trees into their grazing systems.

stats.label: Productivity
stats.description: Silvopasture systems can double land productivity by combining timber, livestock, and biodiversity.

stats.label: Water Reduction
stats.description: Tree shade reduces pasture evaporation, cutting water needs in half while improving soil moisture.

stats.label: More Milk
stats.description: Shaded dairy cows produce up to 30% more milk thanks to reduced heat stress and improved comfort.

stats.label: Years Life
stats.description: Native trees become legacy assets, providing shade, timber, and habitat for multiple generations.
